props.autoSelectFirst: When searching, will always highlight the first option and select it on blur. `exact` will only highlight and select exact matches.
props.delimiters: Accepts an array of strings that will trigger a new tag when typing. Does not replace the normal Tab and Enter keys.

slots.item: Define a custom item appearance. The root element of this slot must be a **v-list-item** with `v-bind="props"` applied. `props` includes everything required for the default select list behaviour - including title, value, click handlers, virtual scrolling, and anything else that has been added with `item-props`.
